trans-unit.target: <p>

trans-unit.source: 1.5.2 - Unreleased
trans-unit.target: 1.5.2-No publicado

trans-unit.source: A bunch of ready to use transformations are also provided. Look at the documentation for more information.
trans-unit.target: También se proporcionan un montón de transformaciones listas para usar.Mira la documentación para más información.

trans-unit.source: Add HTML5 tags as valid:
trans-unit.target: Añadir etiquetas HTML5 como válidas:

trans-unit.source: Add Python 2 / 3 compatibility. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: Añade compatibilidad con Python 2/3.[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Add XSS fixes from Anton Stonor to safe_html transform. [alecm, stonor]
trans-unit.target: Añade las correcciones XSS de Anton Stonor a la transformación safe_html.[alecm,stonor]

trans-unit.source: Add a html filter to extract the content of the body tag (so we don’t get a double <body> when uploading full html files). [dreamcatcher]
trans-unit.target: Add a html filter to extract the content of the body tag (so we don’t get a double <body> when uploading full html files). [dreamcatcher]

trans-unit.source: Add another XSS fix from for handling extraneous brackets. [dunny]
trans-unit.target: Añade otra fijación XSS de para el manejo de soportes extraños.[dunny]

trans-unit.source: Add iframe as a valid tag [vangheem]
trans-unit.target: Añadir iframe como una etiqueta válida [vangheem]

trans-unit.source: Add the fenced_code_blocks extension for Markdown Transformations and depend on Markdown >=2.6.5. https://pythonhosted.org/Markdown/extensions/fenced_code_blocks.html [pcdummy]
trans-unit.target: Add the fenced_code_blocks extension for Markdown Transformations and depend on Markdown >=2.6.5. https://pythonhosted.org/Markdown/extensions/fenced_code_blocks.html [pcdummy]

trans-unit.source: Add the possibility to switch on markdown extension through the zmi. [pabo3000]
trans-unit.target: Añade la posibilidad de activar la extensión de la marcación a través del zmi.[pabo3000]

trans-unit.source: Added
trans-unit.target: Añadido

trans-unit.source: Added HTML5 tags as allowed tags. [limi]
trans-unit.target: Añadidas las etiquetas HTML5 como etiquetas permitidas.[limi]

trans-unit.source: Added __setstate__ to load new transformations from the file system. [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Añadido __setstate__para cargar nuevas transformaciones del sistema de archivos.[tiran]

trans-unit.source: Added context to the convert, convertTo and __call__ methods. The context is the object on which the transform was called. [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Se añadió contexto a los métodos convert,convertTo y __call__.El contexto es el objeto sobre el que se ha llamado a la transformación.[tiran]

trans-unit.source: Added ins and del to the list of valid and safe html tags. [ 1199917 ] XHTML DEL tag is removed during the safe_html conversion [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Añadido ins y del a la lista de etiquetas html válidas y seguras.[1199917]La etiqueta XHTML DEL es removida durante la conversión segura_html [tiran]

trans-unit.source: Added isCacheable flag and setCacheable to idatastream (data.py). Now you can disable the caching of the result of a transformation. [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Añadido el indicador isCacheable y establecido en idatastream (data.py).Ahora puedes deshabilitar el cacheo del resultado de una transformación.[tiran]

trans-unit.source: Added logging to markdown and textile transforms if the libraries are not installed. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8285. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Added logging to markdown and textile transforms if the libraries are not installed. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8285. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added metadata.xml file to the profile. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Añadido el archivo metadata.xml al perfil.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added missing
trans-unit.target: Añadido desaparecido

trans-unit.source: Added proper Z3 interfaces and added direct implements statements instead of applying the changes later on with zcml. Reduced number of zcml files to one. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Añadió interfaces Z3 adecuadas y añadió declaraciones de implementos directos en lugar de aplicar los cambios más tarde con zcml.Reducido el número de archivos zcml a uno.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added q to the list of valid and safe html tags by limi’s request. Wrote test for safe_html parsing. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Added q to the list of valid and safe html tags by limi’s request. Wrote test for safe_html parsing. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added stripped_attributes, stripped_combinations, style_whitelist and class_blacklist attributes to the safe_html transform. [robgietema]
trans-unit.target: Añadidos atributos stripped_attributes,stripped_combinations,style_whitelist y class_blacklist a la transformación safe_html.[robgietema]

trans-unit.source: Added style to nasty tags, addresses http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9015. [jonstahl]
trans-unit.target: Added style to nasty tags, addresses http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9015. [jonstahl]

trans-unit.source: Added win32api.GetShortPathName to libtransforms/commandtransform so binaries found in directories which have spaces in their names will work as expected [runyaga]
trans-unit.target: Añadido win32api.GetShortPathName a libtransforms/commandtransform para que los binarios encontrados en los directorios que tienen espacios en sus nombres funcionen como se espera [runyaga]

trans-unit.source: Added workaround for [ 997998 ] PT breaks ZMI/Find [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Se añadió una solución para[997998]PT rompe ZMI/Find [tiran]

trans-unit.source: Adjust safe_html transform to block various XSS vulnerabilities. This fixes https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/20121106/18 [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Adjust safe_html transform to block various XSS vulnerabilities. This fixes https://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/20121106/18 [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Adjusted rest tests for Zope 2.10 output. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Pruebas de reposo ajustadas para la salida del Zope 2.10.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Allowed the abbr, acronym, var, dfn, samp, address, bdo, thead, tfoot, col, and colgroup tags by default, since they are harmless, valid XHTML and shouldn’t be filtered. Fixes: http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6712 and http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7251 [limi]
trans-unit.target: Allowed the abbr, acronym, var, dfn, samp, address, bdo, thead, tfoot, col, and colgroup tags by default, since they are harmless, valid XHTML and shouldn’t be filtered. Fixes: http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6712 and http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7251 [limi]

trans-unit.source: Authors
trans-unit.target: Autores

trans-unit.source: Avoid DeprecationWarning for manageAddDelete. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Evitar la deprecaciónAvisar para gestionarAñadirBorrar.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Avoid acquiring
trans-unit.target: Evita adquirir

trans-unit.source: Avoid throwing exceptions on js attrs and invalid tags in word_to_html transform [gotcha]
trans-unit.target: Evita lanzar excepciones en js attrs y etiquetas inválidas en word_to_html transform [gotcha]

trans-unit.source: Benjamin Saller <bcsaller@yahoo.com>
trans-unit.target: Benjamin Saller <bcsaller@yahoo.com>

trans-unit.source: Better error handling for safe html transformation [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Mejor manejo de errores para una transformación segura de html [tiran]

trans-unit.source: Breaking changes:
trans-unit.target: Cambios de ruptura:

trans-unit.source: Bug fixes:
trans-unit.target: Arreglos de bichos:

trans-unit.source: Change base class for Transform to SimpleItem which is equivalent to the previous base classes and provides a nice __repr__. [dreamcatcher]
trans-unit.target: Cambiar la clase base para Transformar a SimpleItem que es equivalente a las clases base anteriores y proporciona un bonito __repr__.[atrapasueños]

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: Changelog

trans-unit.source: Clean up temporary files/directories after memory errors and failed conversions. [witsch]
trans-unit.target: Limpiar los archivos/directorios temporales después de los errores de memoria y las conversiones fallidas.[witsch]

trans-unit.source: Cleaned up major parts of PT by removing the python only implementation which was broken anyway
trans-unit.target: Limpió la mayoría de las partes de PT quitando la implementación de pitón que estaba rota de todos modos

trans-unit.source: Cleaned up package metadata. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Limpió los metadatos del paquete.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Close
trans-unit.target: Cerrar

trans-unit.source: Compatibility
trans-unit.target: Compatibilidad

trans-unit.source: Converted logging infrastructure from zLOG usage to Python’s logging module. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Converted logging infrastructure from zLOG usage to Python’s logging module. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Correct some wrong security settings. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Corregir algunas configuraciones de seguridad erróneas.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Declare test dependencies in an extra and fixed deprecation warnings for use of Globals. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Declarar las dependencias de la prueba en un extra y fijo de advertencias de depreciación para el uso de los Globales.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Depend on
trans-unit.target: Depende de

trans-unit.source: Disabled filters that were introduced in 1.3.1-1. The currently used transform path algo is broken took too long to find a path. [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Los filtros deshabilitados que se introdujeron en 1.3.1-1.La ruta de transformación actualmente usada algo está roto tomó demasiado tiempo para encontrar un camino.[tiran]

trans-unit.source: Disabled markdown and textile tests when their libraries aren’t installed [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Disabled markdown and textile tests when their libraries aren’t installed [fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Disabled office_uno by default because it doesn’t support multithread yet [panjunyong]
trans-unit.target: Disabled office_uno by default because it doesn’t support multithread yet [panjunyong]

trans-unit.source: Do not escape <, >, and & inside script tag when it is not suppressed. [gotcha]
trans-unit.target: Do not escape <, >, and & inside script tag when it is not suppressed. [gotcha]

trans-unit.source: Do not expose dead settings in
trans-unit.target: No exponga los escenarios muertos en

trans-unit.source: Do not fail tests if a mimetype already has been registered in the tests. [timo]
trans-unit.target: No se deben suspender las pruebas si ya se ha registrado un mimetismo en las pruebas.[timo]

trans-unit.source: Do not try to handle invalid tags : we take for granted that html coming out of converters do not hold any of embed, script, object or applet tags.
trans-unit.target: No intente manejar etiquetas inválidas:damos por sentado que el html que sale de los convertidores no contiene ninguna etiqueta de embed,script,objeto o applet.

trans-unit.source: Don’t force utf-8 when sub is run on a unicode string. This fixes unicodedecodeerror when we have a match in a unicode string containing non ascii chars. [tmog]
trans-unit.target: Don’t force utf-8 when sub is run on a unicode string. This fixes unicodedecodeerror when we have a match in a unicode string containing non ascii chars. [tmog]

trans-unit.source: Don’t include the first three lines of the lynx output which are url, title and a blank line. This fixed also a unit test because the url which was a file in the fs did change every time. [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Don’t include the first three lines of the lynx output which are url, title and a blank line. This fixed also a unit test because the url which was a file in the fs did change every time. [tiran]

trans-unit.source: Downgraded log messages about unavailable binaries to debug level. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Mensajes de registro degradados sobre binarios no disponibles a nivel de depuración.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Fix NameError in the purgeCache method. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Arreglar NameError en el método purgeCache.[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fix a long outstanding issue with improper COM thread model initialization. Initialize COM for multi-threading, ignoring any errors when someone else has already initialized differently. https://trac.plone.org/plone/ticket/4712 [sidnei]
trans-unit.target: Fix a long outstanding issue with improper COM thread model initialization. Initialize COM for multi-threading, ignoring any errors when someone else has already initialized differently. https://trac.plone.org/plone/ticket/4712 [sidnei]

trans-unit.source: Fix and migrate safe_html filter completly into Plone registry and sync settings with TinyMCE. Also some unused options in controlpanel where removed, like stripped_combinations and class_blacklist. [MrTango]
trans-unit.target: Arreglar y migrar el filtro safe_html completamente en el registro de Plone y sincronizar la configuración con TinyMCE.También algunas opciones no utilizadas en el panel de control fueron eliminadas,como combinaciones y lista negra de clases.[MrTango]

trans-unit.source: Fix handling of CDATA sections. [optilude]
trans-unit.target: Arreglar el manejo de las secciones CDATA.[optilude]

trans-unit.source: Fix manage_options which accidentally got turned into a tuple in some refactoring. [swampmonkey]
trans-unit.target: Arreglar las opciones de gestión que accidentalmente se convirtieron en una tupla en alguna refactorización.[mono de pantano]

trans-unit.source: Fix missing security declarations. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Arreglar las declaraciones de seguridad que faltan.[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fix output of TransformTest to not contain binary in case of failure. This broke the test result parser. [jensens]
trans-unit.target: Fijar la salida de TransformTest para que no contenga binario en caso de fallo.Esto rompió el analizador de resultados de la prueba.[jensens]

trans-unit.source: Fix regression due to the security declarations added in 2.0.4: convertTo should still be public, but not publishable. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Corregir la regresión debido a las declaraciones de seguridad añadidas en 2.0.4:convertTo debe seguir siendo público,pero no publicable.[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fix regression in rest transform vs. old Zope2 reStructuredText wrapper: headings now proper level in settings for body, which was necessary to preserve levels assumed in downstream use of this transform (e.g. Archetypes). Behavior now matches that of previous wrapper. [seanupton]
trans-unit.target: Fijar la regresión en la transformación de reposo vs.la antigua envoltura de Zope2 reStructuredText:los encabezados ahora tienen el nivel adecuado en los ajustes para el cuerpo,lo cual era necesario para preservar los niveles asumidos en el uso posterior de esta transformación (por ejemplo,los arquetipos).El comportamiento ahora coincide con el de la envoltura anterior.[seanupton]

trans-unit.source: Fix the way that unsafe transforms calls the input file for the command line plugin. [encolpe]
trans-unit.target: Arreglar la forma en que esa transformación insegura llama al archivo de entrada del plugin de línea de comandos.[encolpe]

trans-unit.source: Fix: ‘DeprecationWarning: Flags not at the start of the expression’ [jensens] (#40)
trans-unit.target: Fix: ‘DeprecationWarning: Flags not at the start of the expression’ [jensens] (#40)

trans-unit.source: Fix: After using
trans-unit.target: Arreglar:Después de usar

trans-unit.source: Fixed [ 1002014 ] Add policy screen doesn’t accept single entry [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Fixed [ 1002014 ] Add policy screen doesn’t accept single entry [tiran]

trans-unit.source: Fixed [ 1019632 ] current svn bundle (rev 2942) broken
trans-unit.target: Fijo [1019632]actual paquete svn (rev 2942)roto

trans-unit.source: Fixed [ 1025066 ] Serious persistency bug [dmaurer]
trans-unit.target: Arreglado[1025066]Grave error de persistencia [dmaurer]

trans-unit.source: Fixed [ 1041637 ] RichWidget: STX level should be set to 3 instead 1. The structured text transform is now using the zope.conf option or has an optional level paramenter in the convert method. [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Arreglado[1041637]RichWidget:El nivel de STX debe ser fijado en 3 en lugar de 1.La transformación de texto estructurado ahora usa la opción zope.conf o tiene un parámetro de nivel opcional en el método de conversión.[tiran]

trans-unit.source: Fixed [ 1053846 ] Charset problem with wvware word_to_html conversion [flacoste]
trans-unit.target: Corregido[1053846]Problema de charset con la conversión de wvware word_to_html [flacoste]

trans-unit.source: Fixed [ 1118739 ] popentransform does not work on windows [duncanb]
trans-unit.target: Corregido[1118739]popentransform no funciona en las ventanas [duncanb]

trans-unit.source: Fixed [ 1121812 ] fix PortalTransforms unregisterTransformation() unregisterTransformation() misses to remove from the zodb the persistance wrapper added to the trasformation [dan_t]
trans-unit.target: Arreglado[1121812]arreglado PortalTransforms unregisterTransformation()unregisterTransformation()falla al quitar del zodb la envoltura de persistencia añadida a la trasformación [dan_t]

trans-unit.source: Fixed [ 1122175 ] extra indnt sytax error in office_uno.py [ryuuguu]
trans-unit.target: Corregido[1122175]error extra indnt sytax en office_uno.py [ryuuguu]

trans-unit.source: Fixed [ 1293684 ], unregistered Transforms are not unmaped, Transformation was deleted from portal_transforms, but remained active. http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func-detail&aid-1293684&group_id-75272&atid-543430 Added a cleanup that unmaps deleted transforms on reinstall [csenger]
trans-unit.target: Fixed [ 1293684 ], unregistered Transforms are not unmaped, Transformation was deleted from portal_transforms, but remained active. http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func-detail&aid-1293684&group_id-75272&atid-543430 Added a cleanup that unmaps deleted transforms on reinstall [csenger]

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug in make_unpersistent. It seemed that this method touched values inside the mapping. [dreamcatcher]
trans-unit.target: Se ha corregido un error en make_unpersistent.Parecía que este método tocaba valores dentro del mapeo.[dreamcatcher]

trans-unit.source: Fixed a problem where the cache would return data from transforms which are sensitive to virtual hosting (such as the resolve UID transforms used by visual editors) which had been cached for a different virtual host. [rossp]
trans-unit.target: Se ha resuelto un problema por el que la caché devolvía los datos de las transformaciones sensibles al alojamiento virtual (como las transformaciones de resolución UID utilizadas por los editores visuales)que se habían almacenado en la caché para un host virtual diferente.[rossp]

trans-unit.source: Fixed a serious performance issue in the find transform path algorithm. This refs http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9497. [hannosch, sig]
trans-unit.target: Fixed a serious performance issue in the find transform path algorithm. This refs http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9497. [hannosch, sig]

trans-unit.source: Fixed more unit tests [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Arreglado más pruebas de unidad [tiran]

trans-unit.source: Fixed non critical typo in error message: Unvalid -> Invalid [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Fixed non critical typo in error message: Unvalid -> Invalid [tiran]

trans-unit.source: Fixed package dependency declaration. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Declaración de dependencia de paquete fijo.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Fixed python and test pre transforms to use html quote special characters. Thx to stain. [ 1091670 ] Python source code does not escape HTML. [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Fija la pitón y la pretransformación de prueba para usar caracteres especiales de citas html.Thx para teñir.[1091670]El código fuente de python no escapa al HTML.[tiran]

trans-unit.source: Fixed rest tests when run on Zope 2.11. The raw and include directives are disabled but no longer removed. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Pruebas de reposo fijo cuando se ejecuta en el Zope 2.11.Las directivas "raw" e "include" se desactivan pero ya no se eliminan.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Fixed some unit tests failurs. Some unit tests did fail because the reST and STX output has changed slightly. [tiran]
trans-unit.target: He arreglado algunos fallos en las pruebas de la unidad.Algunas pruebas unitarias fallaron porque la salida de reST y STX ha cambiado ligeramente.[tiran]

trans-unit.source: Fixed the requirements look-up from the policy (#1358085)
trans-unit.target: Arreglado la búsqueda de requisitos de la póliza (#1358085)

trans-unit.source: Fixes:
trans-unit.target: Arreglos:

trans-unit.source: For Plone 4 and 5.0, use version 2.x.
trans-unit.target: Para Plone 4 y 5.0,usa la versión 2.x.

trans-unit.source: For Plone 5.1 and later, use version 3.
trans-unit.target: Para Plone 5.1 y posteriores,usa la versión 3.

trans-unit.source: Go back to using getToolByName for CMF tools. [wichert]
trans-unit.target: Vuelve a usar getToolByName para las herramientas de CMF.[wichert]

trans-unit.source: Handle charrefs & entityrefs in data and attributes equaly (unchanged) if converting to safe_html [tom_gross]
trans-unit.target: Handle charrefs & entityrefs in data and attributes equaly (unchanged) if converting to safe_html [tom_gross]

trans-unit.source: Implemented PLIP 149 [tomster]
trans-unit.target: Implementado PLIP 149 [tomster]

trans-unit.source: Implemented entity conversion in html to plain text transform. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Se ha implementado la conversión de entidades en html a la transformación de texto plano.[fschulze]

trans-unit.source: In the safe_html transform, abort parsing if a broken declaration is found. [evilbungle, davisagli]
trans-unit.target: En la transformación safe_html,abortar el análisis si se encuentra una declaración rota.[evilbungle,davisagli]

trans-unit.source: In the safe_html transform, ignore null bytes when checking for unsafe attributes with scripts. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: En la transformación safe_html,ignora los bytes nulos al comprobar los atributos inseguros con los scripts.[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: In the safe_html transform, remove data URIs. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: En el transformador safe_html,elimina las URI de datos.[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Introduce the concept of filters (one-hop transforms where the source and destination are the same mimetype). [dreamcatcher]
trans-unit.target: Introducir el concepto de filtros (transformaciones de un solo paso donde la fuente y el destino son el mismo mimetismo).[atrapasueños]

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: Introducción

trans-unit.source: Let mimetype maps with empty transform lists be handled more gracefully. Fixes: http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10402, refs: r12421. [thet]
trans-unit.target: Let mimetype maps with empty transform lists be handled more gracefully. Fixes: http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10402, refs: r12421. [thet]

trans-unit.source: Lower log levels. [dreamcatcher]
trans-unit.target: Bajar los niveles de registro.[atrapasueños]

trans-unit.source: Lower test requirements for transform tests to only check the start of each file. There’s too many subtle differences in the exact output on different machines. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Lower test requirements for transform tests to only check the start of each file. There’s too many subtle differences in the exact output on different machines. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: MIME based content transformations
trans-unit.target: Transformaciones de contenido basadas en MIME

trans-unit.source: Made sure the meta tag is stripped, since not doing it can let things like HTML redirects slip through, which makes for unpredictable behavior. [limi]
trans-unit.target: Asegurarse de que la meta etiqueta se elimine,ya que no hacerlo puede dejar pasar cosas como las redirecciones HTML,lo que provoca un comportamiento impredecible.[limi]

trans-unit.source: Made the graph tests conditional on the availability of the external binaries for the transform. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Hizo que las pruebas gráficas estuvieran condicionadas a la disponibilidad de los binarios externos para la transformación.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Make markdown transformation unicode safe and depend on Markdown>=1.7 [tomster]
trans-unit.target: Make markdown transformation unicode safe and depend on Markdown>=1.7 [tomster]

trans-unit.source: Make tests compatible with OS other than Ubuntu 14.04. [do3cc]
trans-unit.target: Hacer las pruebas compatibles con otros sistemas operativos que no sean Ubuntu 14.04.[do3cc]

trans-unit.source: Make tests pass with poppler’s pdftohtml converter. Standalone pdftohtml produces different output and should be avoided. [stefan]
trans-unit.target: Make tests pass with poppler’s pdftohtml converter. Standalone pdftohtml produces different output and should be avoided. [stefan]

trans-unit.source: Minor packaging updates. (#1)
trans-unit.target: Actualizaciones menores del embalaje.(#1)

trans-unit.source: New features:
trans-unit.target: Nuevas características:

trans-unit.source: New:
trans-unit.target: Nuevo:

trans-unit.source: Nothing changed.
trans-unit.target: Nada cambió.

trans-unit.source: Notice this package can also be used as a standalone Python package. If you’ve downloaded the Python distribution, you can’t make it a Zope product since Zope files have been removed from this distribution.
trans-unit.target: Notice this package can also be used as a standalone Python package. If you’ve downloaded the Python distribution, you can’t make it a Zope product since Zope files have been removed from this distribution.

trans-unit.source: PEP8 adjustments for the safe_html transform. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Ajustes del PEP8 para la transformación safe_html.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: PEP8 cleanup of the transform engine code. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Limpieza de PEP8 del código del motor de transformación.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Pillow>=3.1.0
trans-unit.target: Pillow>=3.1.0

trans-unit.source: Protect against failures in the transform engine, which prevented zexp imports of sites. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Proteger contra las fallas en el motor de transformación,que impidió la importación de sitios zexp.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Purge old zope2 Interface interfaces for Zope 2.12 compatibility. Consider branching before this checkin if releases required before Plone 4. [elro]
trans-unit.target: Purga las viejas interfaces de la interfaz de Zope2 para la compatibilidad con Zope 2.12.Considere la posibilidad de hacer una ramificación antes de esta comprobación si se requiere una liberación antes de Plone 4.[elro]

trans-unit.source: Remove CMFDefault dependency [tomgross]
trans-unit.target: Eliminar CMFDependencia por defecto [tomgross]

trans-unit.source: Removed BBB code for CMFCorePermissions import location. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Se ha eliminado el código BBB para la ubicación de importación de CMFCorePermissions.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Removed CoUnInitialize call. According to Mark Hammond: The right thing to do is call that function, although almost noone does (including pywin32 itself, which does CoInitialize the main thread) and I’ve never heard of problem caused by this omission. [sidnei]
trans-unit.target: Removed CoUnInitialize call. According to Mark Hammond: The right thing to do is call that function, although almost noone does (including pywin32 itself, which does CoInitialize the main thread) and I’ve never heard of problem caused by this omission. [sidnei]

trans-unit.source: Removed tests/runalltests.py and tests/framework.py as they have outlived their usefulness. To run tests use Zope’s testrunner: ./bin/zopectl test –nowarn -s Products.PortalTransforms [stefan]
trans-unit.target: Removed tests/runalltests.py and tests/framework.py as they have outlived their usefulness. To run tests use Zope’s testrunner: ./bin/zopectl test –nowarn -s Products.PortalTransforms [stefan]

trans-unit.source: Removed useless assert statements. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Eliminó las declaraciones de afirmación inútiles.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Removed z3 sub-package. Interfaces are in the interfaces module. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Eliminado el subpaquete z3.Las interfaces están en el módulo de interfaces.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Repeat safe_html transform to block a malicious HTML injection vector. Thanks to evilbungle for the report. [MatthewWilkes]
trans-unit.target: Repita la transformación safe_html para bloquear un vector de inyección HTML malicioso.Gracias a evilbungle por el informe.[MatthewWilkes]

trans-unit.source: Replaced the safe_html transformation with a configurable version with the same functionality. Migration is handled on reinstall. http://trac.plone.org/plone/ticket/4538 [csenger] [dreamcatcher]
trans-unit.target: Replaced the safe_html transformation with a configurable version with the same functionality. Migration is handled on reinstall. http://trac.plone.org/plone/ticket/4538 [csenger] [dreamcatcher]

trans-unit.source: Restore output/logo.jpg and output/logo.bmp from 1.6 branch. [stefan]
trans-unit.target: Restaurar salida/logo.jpg y salida/logo.bmp de la rama 1.6.[Stefan]

trans-unit.source: Rewrote office_uno to make it work for the recent PyUNO. [panjunyong]
trans-unit.target: Reescribió office_uno para hacerlo funcionar para la reciente PyUNO.[panjunyong]

trans-unit.source: STX header level is set to 2 instead of using zope.conf. Limi forced me to change it. [tiran]
trans-unit.target: El nivel de encabezado STX se establece en 2 en lugar de usar zope.conf.Limi me obligó a cambiarlo.[tiran]

trans-unit.source: Shut down a noisy logging message to DEBUG level. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Apagar un ruidoso mensaje de registro a nivel de DEBUG.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Sidnei da Silva <sidnei@x3ng.com>
trans-unit.target: Sidnei da Silva <sidnei@x3ng.com>

trans-unit.source: Small fix for the com office converter. COM could crash if word is invisible. Also a pop up might appeare when quitting word. [gogo]
trans-unit.target: Pequeño arreglo para el convertidor de la oficina de comunicaciones.La comunicación podría fallar si la palabra es invisible.También un pop-up podría aparecer cuando se deja de usar la palabra.[gogo]

trans-unit.source: Some transform were returning unicode instead of strings in Python 2 (#37)
trans-unit.target: Algunas transformaciones estaban devolviendo unicode en lugar de cuerdas en Python 2 (#37)

trans-unit.source: Spring-cleaning of tests infrastructure. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Limpieza de primavera de la infraestructura de pruebas.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Start fixing startup in py3 [ale-rt, pbauer]
trans-unit.target: Empieza a arreglar la puesta en marcha en py3 [ale-rt,pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Stop using ATTestCase for tests. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Deje de usar ATTestCase para las pruebas.[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Structured Text is gone in Zope 2.12. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: El Texto Estructurado se ha ido en el Zope 2.12.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Sylvain Thenault <sylvain.thenault@logilab.fr>
trans-unit.target: Sylvain Thenault <sylvain.thenault@logilab.fr>

trans-unit.source: The following three changes collectively fix http://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/CVE-2011-1949
trans-unit.target: The following three changes collectively fix http://plone.org/products/plone/security/advisories/CVE-2011-1949

trans-unit.source: This Zope product provides two new tools for the CMF in order to make MIME types based transformations on the portal contents, and so an easy to way to plugin some new transformations for previously unsupported content types. The provided tools are:
trans-unit.target: Este producto de Zope proporciona dos nuevas herramientas para el CMF con el fin de hacer transformaciones basadas en tipos MIME en los contenidos del portal,y así una manera fácil de enchufar algunas nuevas transformaciones para tipos de contenido previamente no soportados.Las herramientas proporcionadas son:

trans-unit.source: This product is an off-spring of the Archetypes project.
trans-unit.target: Este producto es un vástago del proyecto Arquetipos.

trans-unit.source: Transforms to target mimetype with multiple alias mimetypes in mimetypes_registry failed. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8187. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Transforms to target mimetype with multiple alias mimetypes in mimetypes_registry failed. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8187. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Update RoleManager import to avoid deprecation warning on Zope 2.13. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Actualizar la importación del RoleManager para evitar la advertencia de depreciación en Zope 2.13.[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Update output gif; Pillow 2.7.0 no longer optimizes the palette of gifs in RGB mode. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Actualizar gif de salida;Pillow 2.7.0 ya no optimiza la paleta de gifs en modo RGB.[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Updated componentregisty.xml to new style. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Actualizado componentregisty.xml a un nuevo estilo.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Updated expected output images to most current format. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Actualizado las imágenes de salida previstas al formato más actual.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Updated link to rtf converter to http://freshmeat.net/projects/rtfconverter/ [tiran]
trans-unit.target: Updated link to rtf converter to http://freshmeat.net/projects/rtfconverter/ [tiran]

trans-unit.source: Updated test output to be compatible with docutils 0.5. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: La salida de la prueba actualizada para ser compatible con la docutilación 0.5.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Use docutils for rest since the rest-wrapper was removed from zope2. [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: Utiliza docutils para el descanso desde que el envoltorio de descanso fue retirado de zope2.[pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Use lxml.html.Cleaner for safe HTML transforms (PLIP 1441) [prakharjoshi, tomgross]
trans-unit.target: Usar lxml.html.Cleaner para transformaciones seguras de HTML (PLIP 1441)[prakharjoshi,tomgross]

trans-unit.source: Use markdown extension settings from markup control panel. [pabo3000, thomasmassmann] (#30)
trans-unit.target: Utilice la configuración de la extensión de la reducción de la marcación desde el panel de control de la marcación.[pabo3000,thomasmassmann](#30)

trans-unit.source: Use the standard libraries doctest module. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Usa el módulo de prueba de las bibliotecas estándar.[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: When form tag is added to the valid tags, do not remove it anyway. By default the cleaner would always remove form tags and kill button, input, select, and textarea tags Fixes issue 2693. [maurits] (#2693)
trans-unit.target: When form tag is added to the valid tags, do not remove it anyway. By default the cleaner would always remove form tags and kill button, input, select, and textarea tags Fixes issue 2693. [maurits] (#2693)

trans-unit.source: casting to int is evil without previous check of the type. so we assume as in CMFPlone just zero for non-int-castable values. [jensens]

trans-unit.source: note for release-managers: The version-bump to 1.5 was a bit early, but now as we have it, i keep it and next release number in the cycle needed for Archetypes 1.4.2 (used for Plone 2.5.2) of PortalTransforms is then the 1.5 final. We dont need increasing of release numbers because of Plone 3.0, Archetypes 1.5, … if theres no change in the dependen product, like this one. [jensens]
trans-unit.target: note for release-managers: The version-bump to 1.5 was a bit early, but now as we have it, i keep it and next release number in the cycle needed for Archetypes 1.4.2 (used for Plone 2.5.2) of PortalTransforms is then the 1.5 final. We dont need increasing of release numbers because of Plone 3.0, Archetypes 1.5, … if theres no change in the dependen product, like this one. [jensens]

trans-unit.source: the values in the safe_html valid tag dictionary can become strings when modifying them via the ZMI. Explicitly convert them to integers before testing their value. [wichert]
